Introduction
This topic provides an overview of IPC screening and processing functions in the CM portal, including
Super User mail-processing role in the CM portal
Basic User mail-processing role in the CM portal
, and
processing
mail in CM
, and
solicited and unsolicited mail
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Process Overview for Screening Mail
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
